description.displayText: My husband and I were more then grateful to have been able to have Diana take care of our two little girls. She was very professional and just over all a lovely individual! She is great with children and I think it really showed through the love and admiration that our children had for her. She is one of the best nanny's that my family has ever had and were so sad that we were not able to bring her along with us when we moved to Canada. We 100% percent recommend her, she will not disappoint!!

description.displayText: Diana is an amazing, loving nanny, she worked for me for 2 years and took care of my two kids since they were 16 month old. In addition, she worked with me during the whole pandemic. She help with everything related to the kids from laundry meal prep and bath time. She's very punctual and very organized. She made sure to be engaged with my girls and take them to the park and library.
description.originalText: Diana is an amazing, loving nanny, she worked for me for 2 years and took care of my two kids since they were 16 month old. In addition, she worked with me during the whole pandemic. She help with everything related to the kids from laundry meal prep and bath time. She's very punctual and very organized. She made sure to be engaged with my girls and take them to the park and library.

description.displayText: I know Diana through being the part time tutor for some of the kids she used to provide care for. I would see how much she cared for them and the amount of love and attention she provided for the children and the household. She was very patient, kind, attentive and would always go the extra mile for the children. I've met with other caregivers and nannies, but she definitely outshines all others.
description.originalText: I know Diana through being the part time tutor for some of the kids she used to provide care for. I would see how much she cared for them and the amount of love and attention she provided for the children and the household. She was very patient, kind, attentive and would always go the extra mile for the children. I've met with other caregivers and nannies, but she definitely outshines all others.

description.displayText:
I can't say enough about Diana. She is fantastic.  Diana worked for my family as a live-in nanny for three years to care for my two children. Within a month she was running the entire house with tremendous effectiveness. 

Diana is amazingly organized, balancing school drop offs with after school activities, homework time, meals (for the kids and for me), food shopping, errands, whatever we needed she got it done. She always goes far beyond just looking after the kids and keeping them safe, she truly engages and deeply cares. Doing crafts and projects, teaching them responsibility and respect, teaching them how to cook or planning new adventures and learning experiences, and of course, planning play dates with other nannies and other moms (all the moms love her). She has a pride in her actions that permeates into everything she does.

Care.com doesn't give me enough space to finish my thoughts, but trust me, you'd be lucky to have her.
